text: Had a trial lesson with Ariel for vocal coaching, and it was a great experience! Before the lesson, I struggled with tension, particularly on high notes. With Ariel's guidance, I was able to sing more freely and comfortably. She is incredibly patient and knowledgeable, making the learning process enjoyable. I highly recommend her classes to anyone interested in giving singing lessons a try!

Went for a trial lesson with Vocal instructor Ariel on thursday and I really enjoyed the session. Picked quite a tough song to begin with - Never enough which was what i wanted to sing and she was patient in guiding me through when i couldn‚Äôt grasp some part of the techniques for certain lines. Really recommend to go for lessons here!

I went in for a trial and i am completely blown away! Ariel is a knowledgable teacher that fixed many of my singing issues! She is also very polite and patient! The studio itself is also very warm and welcoming. If anyone is in need of vocal lessons. Look no further!

Ariel gave me a lot of tips to improve my singing. With her help, I am beginning to gain confidence in my voice She's a good vocal coach and her feedback is useful and easy to understand. Highly recommend!
